properties.address: Buccleuch House, 4 South Hermitage Street, Newcastleton, Scottish Borders TD9 0QR
properties.description: Open from 09-01-2023. Join us in a warm, friendly space. On Tuesdays we will be providing soup and a roll between 12 and 1pm. We have a wide programme of activities, come along and join in..
properties.title: Newcastleton and District Community Trust
